p: A variable number of alkaloids such as emetine, tylophorine, and mycophenolate mofetil have been reported to be very significant antiviral compounds [ 84, 85]. Chloroquine is a good candidate, asynthetic derivative of quinine for the development of an effective drug to treat COVID-19 because of its DNA-intercalating properties [86]. The isoquinoline alkaloids tetrandrine, fangchinoline, and cepharanthine could inhibit the expression of spike and nucleocapsid proteins in SARS-CoV- OC43 in human lung cells [87].
